subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: The Olympic mythmakers would have us believe that sports can overcome the world’s ills, but we should stop pretending that previous festivals were global campfires and choruses of “Kumbaya.”
snippet: The Olympic mythmakers would have us believe that sports can overcome the world’s ills, but we should stop pretending that previous festivals were global campfires and choruses of “Kumbaya.”
